content:
Sketch.app is gaining constantly popularity the latest months. This was a reason for me for trying out this app. You can download a Free trial of Sketch.

What is Sketch exactly?

“Sketch is a professional vector graphics app with a beautiful interface and powerful tools. We set out to build a better app for graphic designers. Not to copy, but rather to improve.”

Some advantages of Sketch are:

  • Sketch is created for UI designers, where Photoshop hasn’t this purpose.
  • It works with vectors
  • Democratic price: $49,99 dollars

Sketch templates & resources

  • iOS Devices templates 
  • SketchMine: a great collection of free .sketch files

Sketch tutorials

  • Photoshop users: how to switch to Sketch
  • Sketch vs. Photoshop
  • Sketch Tips

Have you other interesting links? Feel free to share them in the comments!
